issue.title: [Doc] Remove experimental marker for Flight RPC in feature matrix
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/status.html, Flight RPC is still marked experimental. We should probably remove that mention as it was already removed from the corresponding format specification page (https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/format/Flight.html)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17617?focusedCommentId=17600476) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~lidavidm]` Does that sound right?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17617?focusedCommentId=17600490) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Hmm, did we ever mark it on that page?

That said, Flight.proto doesn't say anything about being experimental, I'll have to check if the original vote(s) said anything, if not, let's just remove it

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17617?focusedCommentId=17600981) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Looking around, I don't actually see a vote (maybe it was from before we adopted that procedure?) so I suppose let's remove the experimental qualifier.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17617?focusedCommentId=17600982) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Actually yeah: Flight predates https://lists.apache.org/thread/9t0pglrvxjhrt4r4xcsc1zmgmbtr8pxj

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17617?focusedCommentId=17603407) by Yibo Cai (yibocai):*
